name: cmsc-135-mp1
description: Execution intructions 1. Make sure to install Node.js https://nodejs.org/en/download/package-manager 2. At the terminal of the directory (.../Battleship-main) run ‘npm init -y’ 3. Then, run ‘npm i express socket.io dotenv ip’ 4. Once the modules have been installed, run ‘npm start’ 5. Links for the local host and network should show in the terminal
